FirstCoffee: ^After a successful first pitch at the introductory lab meeting, you decide to catch up with one of your peers, Ivy. She sits down across the table from you, setting down her coffee and smiling.
^Ivy: "Hey Bronislav. Happy to see you again."
^"Nice to see you too, Ivy. How've you been?"
IvyCatchesUp: ^Ivy: "I've been pretty busy, but keeping up with all of it pretty well. How'd the lab meeting go? Did you meet anyone who could help you on your paper?"
InterestInPaper: ^Bronislav: "Yes! After my talk I was approached by someone who had interest in my presentation."
^Ivy: "That's great to hear. Did you happen to catch his name?"
JensenByName: ^Ivy: "That's great to hear! I know Jensen and he's been having some problems getting into grad school. Being on this paper would be great for him."
^"I see a bit of myself in him."
^"He needs an opportunity more at his level."
BronislavSympathizes: ^Bronislav: "Getting into grad school wasn't easy for me either, so I see a bit of myself in him. I'll keep him in mind."
^Ivy still very cheerful about the good news is also a bit confused.
^Ivy: "Do you have some reservations about Jensen?"
IvySpite: ^Bronislav: "I did also talk with Brad after my presentation, and he felt a bit put off by Jensen."
^Ivy: "Well Bronislav, I can assure you that there is nothing 'off' about Jensen. He's a good kid, so at least keep him in mind."
^She leaves the table quickly after saying this.
TooSoon: ^Bronislav:"It just is way too soon to make a call like that. I'd like to talk with a few more people before I start adding people to the paper."
^She takes a long sip of her drink.
^Ivy: "Well ok then, that is fair. At least consider him, ok?"
MoreTime: ^Bronislav: ""As much as I wish I could help right now I just want to keep my options open."
^She takes a long sip of her drink.
^Ivy: "Well ok then, that is fair. Keep him in mind at least?"
IvyRecommendsJensen: ^Ivy: "Well I have a friend who is struggling to get into grad school right now named Jensen. Getting on such a big paper would certainly help him."
Continue: ^Ivy: "Oh! I actually need to go to a meeting. Thanks for organizing this Bronislav, hope to hear from you again soon."
bron_ivy_irb_review: ^With your survey approved, you start to pack up and head home to work more on your paper. However, as you start to walk away Ivy flags you down.

c-0: ^Bronislav: "It sure did. I was just about to go home and start working more on the paper."

Proposition: ^"Great to hear. I do have a proposition for you Bronislav."
PropInfo: ^Ivy: "My uncle works at a prestigious research firm, and they've been looking for a graduate student with your skillset."
^"That sounds great! What would I need to do?"

c-0: ^Ivy:"I know you've been on the fence about Jensen, but if you can get him on that paper I can help your career out a bit too."
c-1: ^Ivy: "My uncle has been looking for someone to add to his firm with good mentorship skills. Being able to teach someone less knowledgeable than yourself is a useful skill Bronislav."

TheCatch: ^Bronislav:"That sounds great Ivy! Is there anything I need to do to contact him?"
^Ivy: "I can definitely put in a good word for you with him. All you need to do is add Jensen to your paper, and you've got yourself a deal."
^Ivy: "In exchange for putting Jensen on your paper, I can talk to my uncle who works at a research firm who have been looking for a new hire. So, what do you think?"
^Ivy: "Add Jensen to that paper Bronislav. Do that and I can talk with my uncle and put in a good word for you."
AcceptingDeal: ^Bronislav: "That's it? You've got yourself a deal Ivy!"
^Ivy: "Incredible. I'll talk with my uncle ASAP and get back to you about that job."
Unsure: ^Bronislav: "Sounds a bit fishy, I'm not quite sure yet. Let me think about it some more."
^Ivy: "Ok, but opportunities like these don't come around often."
DenyDeal: ^Bronislav: "Ivy that is textbook quid pro quo, my reputation would go down the drain."
^Ivy: "Have it your way Bronislav. Won't get an opportunity like that ever again."
irb_rev_cont: ^Ivy packs her stuff up, smiling as usual. Quite the exciting prospect, getting connections in such a high place. However, if you get caught your reputation can be devalued greatly.
^Ivy: "You know where to reach me if you change your mind."
^Ivy packs her stuff up and leaves. As great of an opportunity that would be for your career, can you run the risk of getting caught?
^Ivy leaves angrily. She is somewhat right, opportunities like that are rare. However, integrity is priceless.
scenePositive: ^Jensen says as he walks up to you.
^Jensen: "I've heard that my feedback on your presentation got me co-authorship."
scenePositiveIvy: ^Jensen sits down at your table quietly, then eventually speaks up with a smile,
^Jensen: "I hope my feedback is helping the paper come along well."
sceneNeutral: ^Jensen: "Thank you so much for the advice and opportunity for co-authorship Bronislav. Happy I could help."
sceneNeutralIvy: ^Jensen: "Hey, Bronislav, I was wondering, am I joining the paper?"
^He looks at you with eyes akin to a puppy.
^"No, your feedback wouldn't hold up to review."
sceneNegative: ^Jensen sits down across the table from you, setting down his coffee and smiling.
^Jensen: "Hey Bronislav, I know we got off on the wrong foot, but I'm happy that you decided to include me as a co-author on your paper."
KeepOnHustling: ^Bronislav: "Keep on hustling Jensen, as long as you put in the work that you have been you'll go far."
OnlyDoingItForTheJob: ^Bronislav: "Look Jensen, you seem like a nice guy so I'll just tell you. Ivy offered me a job opportunity if I put you as a co-author. I'm putting you on here strictly for that job."
YesIncluded: ^Jensen's expression shifts to a relieved smile.
NoIncluded: ^Bronislav: "No, your feedback woudln't hold up to review."
^His innocent gaze contorts into a naive sadness.
^Jensen: "O-Oh, alright. I was really hoping on getting my name on a paper..."
ShakeHandLeave: ^He shakes your hand with a big smile.
^Jensen: "Of course, glad to have a mentor like you Bronislav."
GetUpAndLeave: ^You abruptly get up and leave after telling Jensen this. He looks deeply ashamed hearing it.
bron_and_jen_intro: ^Jensen: "Bronislav was it? Nice to meet you, my name is Jensen."
^He extends his hand for you to shake.
^"Nice to meet you too Jensen." Shake his hand.
ShakeHand: ^Jensen: "Likewise. I just wanted to talk to you about your presentation and some feedback I had for it."
^"Oh, fantastic." Pull out your own notebook.
Notebook: ^Jensen: "I did like how you presented your information for the first half, but got really confused about halfway through. I also thought that you could have presented your evidence better, and had a stronger conclusion."
^"Could you tell me a little more?"
^"This has to be your first time at a meeting like this isn't it."
WriteDown: ^Bronislav: "Yes, of course. Thanks for letting me know."
^You write down his feedback in your notebook. He smiles happily, and walks off.
MoreInfo: ^Bronislav: "Could you tell me a little more about what did confuse you, and how I could present my evidence better?"
FirstTime: ^Bronislav: "This has to be your first time at a meeting like this isn't it?"
^You put the pen and notebook back away. Jensen turns away ashamed by you mocking his input.
